statements: SELECT * FROM SalesReports;
SELECT report_name, sales_amount FROM SalesReports WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT report_name, sales_date FROM SalesReports WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SalesReports WHERE sales_amount < 5000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT report_name, sales_amount FROM SalesReports ORDER BY report_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalesReports ORDER BY sales_date DESC, sales_amount ASC
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM SalesReports WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT report_name, sales_date FROM SalesReports WHERE report_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM SalesReports WHERE sales_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000
SELECT report_name, sales_amount FROM SalesReports WHERE sales_amount < 500 ORDER BY report_name
SELECT * FROM sales_report ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT team_name, total_sales FROM sales_report JOIN sales_team ON sales_report.report_id = sales_team.team_id;
SELECT report_id, total_sales FROM sales_report WHERE total_sales > 5000;
SELECT team_name, SUM(total_sales) AS total_sales_amount FROM sales_report JOIN sales_team ON sales_report.report_id = sales_team.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT report_id, total_sales, sales_target FROM sales_report WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM sales_report WHERE report_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT report_id, total_sales FROM sales_report WHERE total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT team_name, manager_id FROM sales_team WHERE total_members >= 5 AND team_id <= 10;
SELECT * FROM sales_report WHERE total_sales BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_sales, sales_target FROM sales_report JOIN sales_team ON sales_report.report_id = sales_team.team_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports;
SELECT report_name, total_sales FROM sales_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, total_sales FROM sales_reports ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT target_name, sales_goal FROM sales_targets;
SELECT target_name, sales_goal FROM sales_targets WHERE sales_goal > 5000;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports WHERE total_sales > 1000;
SELECT report_name, total_sales FROM sales_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT report_name, target_name, actual_sales FROM sales_reports sr JOIN sales_performance sp ON sr.report_id = sp.report_id JOIN sales_targets st ON sp.target_id = st.target_id;

SELECT report_name, target_name, actual_sales FROM sales_reports sr JOIN sales_performance sp ON sr.report_id = sp.report_id JOIN sales_targets st ON sp.target_id = st.target_id WHERE total_sales > sales_goal;
SELECT report_name, total_sales FROM sales_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, total_sales FROM sales_reports WHERE total_sales > 5000;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM sales_teams WHERE team_leader = 'John Doe';
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM sales_metrics WHERE metric_value < 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT report_id, report_name, total_sales FROM sales_reports;
SELECT * FROM sales_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM sales_reports WHERE total_sales > 10000;
SELECT sm.metric_name, sr.report_date, st.target_amount FROM sales_metrics sm JOIN sales_reports sr ON sm.report_id = sr.report_id JOIN sales_targets st ON st.target_id = sr.report_id;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, target_date, target_description FROM sales_teams st JOIN sales_targets stg ON st.target_id = stg.target_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_units_sold FROM sales_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT rep_id, rep_name, territory FROM sales_representatives WHERE territory='East';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT rep_name, territory, total_sales FROM sales_reports as s INNER JOIN sales_representatives as r ON s.rep_id = r.rep_id WHERE total_sales > 10000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(customer_email) > 0 AND customer_phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports as s LEFT JOIN sales_targets as t ON s.report_date = t.target_date WHERE s.total_sales >= t.target_amount ORDER BY s.total_sales DESC;
